Current environment: -= Livingroom =- If you're wondering why everything seems so typical all of a sudden, it's because you've just shown up in the livingroom. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You see a sofa. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! There is a closed front door leading west. You need an exit without a door? You should try going east. You need an exit without a door? You should try going south.
